description: This is a C source file implementing helper functions for processing MessagePack data structures, including a function for converting buffers to structured data, and internal functions for finding map objects within MessagePack maps.

methods.name: msgpack_object * __finder_comp(const char * name,msgpack_object_type expect_type,msgpack_object_map * map)
methods.description: Internal helper function to locate a key within a MessagePack map and verify its type.
